name: Harmonic Discovery
headline: Multi-targeted therapeutics to treat complex diseases
description:
We are a drug discovery company developing a new generation of therapeutics that embrace the complexity of disease. Currently available approaches for creating drugs work on the principle of finding one drug-one protein 'magic bullets'. However, diseases such as cancer and autoimmunity are often the result of several dysregulated proteins across many distinct biological pathways. 

We are building a computational-experimental platform to design therapeutics that can target several disease-causing proteins at once. By designing multi-specific drugs, we are able to create therapeutics that are more efficacious and safer than existing medicines.

founders.name: Marcel Patek, Founder
founders.description: I am a chemist with training in Medicinal, Organic, Computational, and Peptide chemistry. In my 25+ years in the field, I carried out drug discovery projects involving small molecules and peptides. I worked in environments of startup and global large pharma companies where I led teams and departments in all aspects of early drug discovery. I currently focus on merging experience-based knowledge of molecular optimization with ML/AI systems.

# Engineering Precision Pharmacology
At Harmonic Discovery we leverage machine learning to develop next generation medicines with precision pharmacology
[Learn More About Our Science](http://harmonicdiscovery.com/</science>)
Currentmedicine
Current paradigm of drug discovery favors designs that target a single biological mechanism.
Currentmedicine
Unexpected off-targets cause side effects.
Currentmedicine
Misses additional targets that might be helpful.
HarmonicDiscovery
Removes off targets.
HarmonicDiscovery
At Harmonic Discovery, we are creating a new generation of therapeutics that embrace the complexity of disease
Current drug discovery aims for selectivity
Many drugs are often designed against a single protein target in mind 
Yet often fails to address specific anti-targets 
Off-target interactions occur, some off target interactions are anti-targets that can drive adverse reactions
And key secondary targets are out of scope
Additional targets can enhance efficacy, mitigate toxicities and shut down resistance pathways
Our platform dials out specific anti-targets
Our generative chemistry platform enables us to identify the correct modifications to molecules that tune out toxic off-targets 
And enables rational multi-targeted drug discovery
By tuning out anti-targets and tuning-in additional targets, we are engineering medicines with precision pharmacology- medicines that can address the complexity of disease 
# our platform
## Built on a bedrock of peer-reviewed science and industry expertise
Our therapeutics are the result of integrating several layers of information, from single point mutations in protein sequence, through 3-dimensional conformational changes of protein structure, to systematic changes in protein gene expression
[dive into our Platform](http://harmonicdiscovery.com/</platform>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6315c619e690744f1c97e939/65ccc16f153de90e9a390787_10.svg)Leveraging multiple data types for improved compound-kinase bioactivity predictionIn this work, we built a model to integrate several bioactivity data types to improve compound-kinase bioactivity prediction](http://harmonicdiscovery.com/<https:/www.nature.com/articles/s41467-024-52055-5>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6315c619e690744f1c97e939/65ccc0fd2393f880c75e6615_1.svg)Investigating the Conformational Landscape of AlphaFold2-Predicted Protein Kinase Structures In this work, we investigated the conformational space and utility of protein kinase structures generated by AlphaFold2 ](http://harmonicdiscovery.com/<https:/academic.oup.com/bioinformaticsadvances/article/3/1/vbad129/7274859>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6315c619e690744f1c97e939/65ccc10dd7f534b4c741c9d4_3.svg)Preference Optimization for Molecular Language Models In this work, we show that we can use Direct Preference Optimization to align generative chemistry models with medicinal chemist preferences](http://harmonicdiscovery.com/<https:/arxiv.org/abs/2310.12304>)

# Built by aN interdisciplinary team
Our team represents the intersection of experts across medicinal chemistry, cheminformatics, data science and machine learning
## [Join us ↗We look for passionate innovators, radicalthinkers and collaborative builders](http://harmonicdiscovery.com/</careers>)
## Backed by the best
We are supported by several of the best investors operating at the interface of technology, biology and medicine

# Engineering Precision Pharmacology
At Harmonic Discovery we leverage machine learning to develop next generation medicines with precision pharmacology
Learn More About Our Science⟨3⟩
Currentmedicine
Current paradigm of drug discovery favors designs that target a single biological mechanism.
Currentmedicine
Unexpected off-targets cause side effects.
Currentmedicine
Misses additional targets that might be helpful.
HarmonicDiscovery
Removes off targets.
HarmonicDiscovery
At Harmonic Discovery, we are creating a new generation of therapeutics that embrace the complexity of disease
Current drug discovery aims for selectivity
Many drugs are often designed against a single protein target in mind 
Yet often fails to address specific anti-targets 
Off-target interactions occur, some off target interactions are anti-targets that can drive adverse reactions
And key secondary targets are out of scope
Additional targets can enhance efficacy, mitigate toxicities and shut down resistance pathways
Our platform dials out specific anti-targets
Our generative chemistry platform enables us to identify the correct modifications to molecules that tune out toxic off-targets 
And enables rational multi-targeted drug discovery
By tuning out anti-targets and tuning-in additional targets, we are engineering medicines with precision pharmacology- medicines that can address the complexity of disease 
# our platform
## Built on a bedrock of peer-reviewed science and industry expertise
Our therapeutics are the result of integrating several layers of information, from single point mutations in protein sequence, through 3-dimensional conformational changes of protein structure, to systematic changes in protein gene expression

generated_description:
### Harmonic Discovery: Pioneering Multi-Targeted Therapeutics

**Founded:** 2021  
**Location:** New York  
**Current Team Size:** 8  
**Batch:** Y Combinator S21  
**Website:** [Harmonic Discovery](http://harmonicdiscovery.com)

#### Mission
Harmonic Discovery is on a mission to develop multi-targeted therapeutics aimed at tackling complex diseases like cancer and autoimmunity. Traditional drug discovery often relies on the "one drug, one target" approach, which oversimplifies the intricacies of these diseases. By focusing on multiple disease-causing proteins, Harmonic Discovery seeks to design drugs that are not only more effective but also safer.

#### The Approach
The company is building a unique computational-experimental platform that leverages machine learning to facilitate the design of multi-specific drugs. This platform is engineered to specifically target various dysregulated proteins involved in diseases, sidestepping the pitfalls of conventional methodologies that frequently overlook beneficial targets or introduce undesirable side effects.

In contrast to the typical focus on selectivity, their strategy addresses the complexities of disease by tuning out harmful off-targets and tuning in helpful secondary targets. This is what they refer to as **"Precision Pharmacology."** Their team combines expertise across medicinal chemistry, cheminformatics, data science, and machine learning, ensuring a holistic approach to drug discovery.

#### Current Progress
Their work involves integrating diverse biological data, from protein mutations to gene expression changes, constructing a well-rounded view of how to optimize drug interactions. The company is actively researching and developing various models to improve predictions and therapeutic outcomes.

Moreover, Harmonic Discovery is backed by prominent investors who specialize in the intersection of tech, biology, and medicine, which speaks volumes about their credibility and potential for future innovation.

#### Seeking Innovators
Harmonic Discovery is always on the lookout for passionate innovators and thinkers who can contribute to this ambitious endeavor. If you’re someone who thrives in collaborative environments, they invite you to explore career opportunities.

In a world where many health challenges stem from complex biological interactions, Harmonic Discovery is at the forefront, pushing the boundaries of what's possible in therapeutic design. If you're intrigued by the future of medicine, this is a company worth keeping an eye on.
